EmailTemplate.description: Tells recipient that a new Eastern Canada Trans opp has been entered
EmailTemplate.name: New Canada East Trans opportunity
EmailTemplate.subject: Department 4048, 4038, 4134, 4084, 4035, 4159 has been assigned to
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A Salesforce user has assigned one of the specified departments to an opportunity. Opportunity: {!Opportunity_Department__c.Opportunity__c} Department: {!Opportunity_Department__c.AECOM_Department__c} Click to view: {!Opportunity.Name}
